com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.provider

Interface ResourceProviderMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ProviderMetadata
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatabaseServerProviderMetadata
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleDatabaseServerProviderMetadata, SimpleResourceProviderMetadata

    public interface ResourceProviderMetadata
extends ProviderMetadata
    Provider metadata about a resource provider.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<? extends ResourceProvider<?,?>> getProviderClass()
      Returns the resource provider class.
      List<DisplayProperty> getResourceDisplayProperties()
      Returns the list of display properties exposed by a resource.
      List<ConfigurationProperty> getResourceTemplateConfigurationProperties()
      Returns the list of properties needed to create a new resource template.
      ConfigurationValidator getResourceTemplateConfigurationValidator()
      Returns the resource template configuration validator.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.cloudera.director.spi.v1.provider.ProviderMetadata

        getDescription, getId, getLocalizationContext, getName, getProviderConfigurationProperties, getProviderConfigurationValidator

      • getResourceTemplateConfigurationValidator

        ConfigurationValidator getResourceTemplateConfigurationValidator()
        Returns the resource template configuration validator. The validator should make a best-faith effort to identify configuration problems that will prevent successful resource template creation.
        Returns:
        the configuration validator
